content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: PEORRES
      operator: empty
    - name: PESTRESC
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000082
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Verify that PESTRESC is null when PEORRES is null
Outcome:
  Message: PESTRESC value is not missing when PEORRES value is missing
  Output Variables:
    - PEORRES
    - PESTRESC
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0561
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: If PEORRES is null, PESTRESC must be null.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 6.3.8
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - PE

json.Description: Verify that PESTRESC is null when PEORRES is null

Outcome.Message: PESTRESC value is not missing when PEORRES value is missing

Citations.Cited_Guidance: If PEORRES is null, PESTRESC must be null.
